regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation of manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or confirm to the user when a manual switch change is made to ensure awareness of the temporary state change until default settings resume.

regen.absent_element: notification or alert when default settings resume
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when the default settings resume after the end of the planned or default time period.

regen.absent_element: indication of when the default settings will resume after manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall inform the user about the remaining time until the default settings resume after a manual power switch change.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
